NMVTIS

US Federal Database

National Motor Vehicle Title Information System providing title, brand, and odometer data.

CPIC

Canadian Database

Canadian Police Information Centre providing stolen vehicle and criminal records data.

Coverage: CanadaLearn More

DVLA

UK Vehicle Registry

Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency providing UK vehicle registration and MOT data.

Coverage: UKLearn More

Leading European automotive marketplace providing market valuations and listings data.

JEVIC

Coverage: JapanLearn More

NEVDIS

Australia Registry

National Exchange of Vehicle and Driver Information System for Australian vehicle data.
